house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1996 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Kitchen Island, Pantry
